snippet: Two Frenchmen suspected of plotting terrorist attacks were detained amid heightened concern about threats to France over its campaign against fighters in Mali linked to Al Qaeda.
abstract: Two Frenchmen suspected of plotting terrorist attacks are detained amid heightened concern about threats to France over its campaign against fighters in Mali linked to Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: Two Frenchmen suspected of plotting terrorist attacks were detained amid heightened concern about threats to France over its campaign against fighters in Mali linked to Al Qaeda.

headline.main: 2 French Citizens Accused of Terrorist Plot
